description:
From February 9th to March 11th, get a free Anti-Static Project Tray with the purchase of a Laptop Repair Kit with code FIXTRAY at https://ifix.gd/Techquickie

Learn about pneumatic tubes, why they're still being used today, and why we're not all traveling around in them!

Leave a reply with your requests for future episodes.

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com

title: Why We Don’t Travel in Tubes
